Purpose: To quantify Tomato-specific IgG antibodies in patient serum/plasma for accurate and reliable diagnostic assessment.
Container: Non-heparinized tube such as an SST or EDTA tube
Equipment: ELISA reader, microplate washer, 37 °C incubator, pipettes, vortex mixer, refrigerator (2-8 °C), freezer (≤ −20 °C)
